name: WinterLand Death Deck (Face-Down)
effect: This card is currently face-down or has not yet been collected.
logic_action: Face-down placeholder card. Flips to reveal trap or hidden card when triggered. Moves from deck to hand when drawn or field to discard when destroyed.
tags: face_down, trap_ready, hidden, flip_reveal, draw, discarded_hidden

name: M4-A1
effect: Rapid fire – deal 20 DMG, then discard 1 card
logic_action: Play from hand. Deal 20 DMG to 1 enemy field card (or opponent if no field cards exist). Then discard 1 card from your hand. Discard this card after use.

name: AKM
effect: Powerful rifle shot – deal 25 DMG
logic_action: Play from hand. Deal 25 DMG to 1 enemy field card (or opponent if no field cards exist). Discard this card after use.

name: Mosin-Nagant
effect: Scoped shot – deal 30 DMG, skip next draw
logic_action: Play from hand. Deal 30 DMG to 1 enemy field card (or opponent if no field cards exist). Skip your next draw phase. Discard this card after use. Tagged as sniper.

name: SKS
effect: Semi-auto fire – deal 18 DMG and draw 1 card
logic_action: Play from hand. Deal 18 DMG to 1 enemy field card (or opponent if no field cards exist). Then draw 1 card. Discard this card after use.

name: CR-527
effect: Hunting shot – deal 22 DMG to infected targets
logic_action: Play from hand. Deal 22 DMG to 1 infected-tagged enemy field card (or opponent if no field cards exist). Discard this card after use. Tagged as hunting_rifle.

name: CR-550 Savanna
effect: Sniper round – deal 35 DMG but reveals your hand
logic_action: Play from hand. Deal 35 DMG to 1 enemy field card (or opponent if no field cards exist). Reveal your hand to opponent after attack. Discard this card after use. Tagged as sniper.

name: BK-133
effect: Shotgun blast – deal 15 DMG to all enemies
logic_action: Play from hand. Deal 15 DMG to all enemy field cards. If no enemy cards exist, deal 15 DMG to opponent. Discard this card after use.

name: BK-18
effect: Single shot – deal 15 DMG and draw a loot card
logic_action: Play from hand. Deal 15 DMG to 1 enemy field card (or opponent if no field cards exist). Draw 1 loot card if hit. Discard this card after use.

name: MK II
effect: Small caliber – deal 10 DMG, silenced
logic_action: Play from hand. Deal 10 DMG to 1 enemy field card (or opponent if no field cards exist). Discard this card after use. Tagged as silenced.

effect: Sidearm burst – deal 15 DMG
logic_action: Play from hand. Deal 15 DMG to 1 enemy field card (or opponent if no field cards exist). Discard this card after use.

name: Deagle
effect: High power – deal 28 DMG, 5% chance to backfire
logic_action: Play from hand. Deal 28 DMG to 1 enemy field card (or opponent if no field cards exist). 5% chance to take 5 self-DMG. Discard this card after use.

name: VSS Vintorez
effect: Silenced auto – deal 12 DMG, does not reveal attacker
logic_action: Play from hand. Deal 12 DMG to 1 enemy field card (or opponent if no field cards exist). Attacker is not revealed. Discard this card after use. Tagged as silenced_rifle.

name: SVD
effect: Marksman precision – deal 30 DMG, ignore armor
logic_action: Play from hand. Deal 30 DMG to 1 enemy field card (or opponent if no field cards exist). Ignores armor and block effects. Discard this card after use. Tagged as sniper.

name: M70 Tundra
effect: Big game rifle – deal 35 DMG, skip your next turn
logic_action: Play from hand. Deal 35 DMG to 1 enemy field card (or opponent if no field cards exist). Skip your next turn. Discard this card after use. Tagged as sniper.

name: IZH-18
effect: Break-action shot – deal 20 DMG
logic_action: Play from hand. Deal 20 DMG to 1 enemy field card (or opponent if no field cards exist). Discard this card after use.

name: Sawed-off Shotgun
effect: Close quarters – deal 25 DMG, recoil deals 5 to self
logic_action: Play from hand. Deal 25 DMG to 1 enemy field card (or opponent if no field cards exist). Recoil: take 5 DMG. Discard this card after use.

name: USG-45
effect: SMG burst – deal 18 DMG, quick reload
logic_action: Play from hand. Deal 18 DMG to 1 enemy field card (or opponent if no field cards exist). No delay between actions. Discard this card after use.

name: UMP-45
effect: Silenced fire – deal 15 DMG, draw 1 tactical card
logic_action: Play from hand. Deal 15 DMG to 1 enemy field card (or opponent if no field cards exist). If enemy is infected, draw 1 tactical card. Discard this card after use.

name: KA-74
effect: Reliable damage – deal 20 DMG
logic_action: Play from hand. Deal 20 DMG to 1 enemy field card (or opponent if no field cards exist). Discard this card after use.

name: KA-M
effect: Enhanced rifle fire – deal 25 DMG, draw 1 defense card
logic_action: Play from hand. Deal 25 DMG to 1 enemy field card (or opponent if no field cards exist). If damage connects, draw 1 defense card. Discard this card after use.

name: FAL
effect: Auto burst – deal 30 DMG, skip next action
logic_action: Play from hand. Deal 30 DMG to 1 enemy field card (or opponent if no field cards exist). Skip your next action. Discard this card after use.

name: AK-101
effect: Balanced rifle – deal 22 DMG, immune to stuns this turn
logic_action: Play from hand. Deal 22 DMG to 1 enemy field card (or opponent if no field cards exist). Immune to stun this turn. Discard this card after use.

name: AK-74
effect: Controlled fire – deal 20 DMG and buff next defense by +5
logic_action: Play from hand. Deal 20 DMG to 1 enemy field card (or opponent if no field cards exist). Next defense card played gets +5 durability. Discard this card after use.

name: M16-A2
effect: 3-round burst – deal 24 DMG
logic_action: Play from hand. Deal 24 DMG to 1 enemy field card (or opponent if no field cards exist). Discard this card after use.

effect: SMG sweep – deal 15 DMG, then draw 1
logic_action: Play from hand. Deal 15 DMG to 1 enemy field card (or opponent if no field cards exist). Then draw 1 card. Discard this card after use.

name: MP5-K
effect: Fast fire – deal 15 DMG, +5 if enemy is infected
logic_action: Play from hand. Deal 15 DMG to 1 enemy field card (or opponent if no field cards exist). Deal +5 DMG if target is infected. Discard this card after use.

name: Repeater
effect: Lever-action shot – deal 20 DMG
logic_action: Play from hand. Deal 20 DMG to 1 enemy field card (or opponent if no field cards exist). Discard this card after use.

name: Derringer
effect: Double shot – deal 10x2 DMG, reload required
logic_action: Play from hand. Deal 20 DMG (10x2) to 1 enemy field card (or opponent if no field cards exist). Card must be reloaded next turn before reuse. Discard this card after use.

name: Longhorn
effect: Scoped pistol – deal 18 DMG, +10 if target is marked
logic_action: Play from hand. Deal 18 DMG (+10 if enemy is marked) to 1 enemy field card (or opponent if no field cards exist). Discard this card after use. Tagged as scoped_pistol.

name: Crossbow
effect: Silent strike – deal 25 DMG, draw 1 trap card
logic_action: Play from hand. Deal 25 DMG to 1 enemy field card (or opponent if no field cards exist). Draw 1 trap card. Discard this card after use. Tagged as crossbow.

name: Tactical Vest
effect: Blocks 15 DMG and grants +5 inventory slots
logic_action: Blocks 15 DMG. Grants +1 card draw per turn for 5 turns while in play, if hand space allows.

name: Ballistic Helmet
effect: Blocks 20 DMG from headshots
logic_action: Blocks all attack card damage while in play. Also negates critical hit effects (e.g., sniper combos).

name: Assault Helmet
effect: Reduces all incoming damage by 10 for 2 turns
logic_action: Reduces all incoming damage by 10 for 2 full turns while in play. Buff does not stack.

name: Combat Boots
effect: Immune to bear traps and tripwires
logic_action: Immune to trap cards tagged as beartrap or tripwire.

name: Plate Carrier
effect: Blocks 30 DMG, but reduces next draw by 1 card
logic_action: Blocks 30 DMG. When played, reduce player’s next draw by 1 card.

name: NBC Suit
effect: Immune to gas/infected cards for 2 turns
logic_action: Negates all infected, gas, and poison tagged cards for 2 turns.

name: Motorbike Helmet
effect: Blocks 10 DMG and reflects 5 DMG on impact
logic_action: Blocks 10 DMG and reflects 5 DMG to opponent when attacked.

name: Gorka Jacket
effect: Blocks 15 DMG and provides weather resistance
logic_action: Blocks 15 DMG. Weather resistance is aesthetic only. Must be destroyed before player can take damage.

name: Gorka Pants
effect: Reduces all damage by 5 while equipped
logic_action: Reduces all incoming damage by 5 while equipped.

name: Combat Gloves
effect: Negate trap effects and gain +5 DMG for melee
logic_action: Negates all trap card effects (any card tagged as trap). Grants +5 DMG with melee cards (placeholder effect).

name: Hunter Jacket
effect: Heal 5 HP per turn for 2 turns
logic_action: Restore 5 HP per turn for 2 turns. Ends early if a card with healing negation is in play.

name: Tactical Shirt
effect: Blocks 10 DMG, allows +1 action once
logic_action: Blocks 10 DMG. Grants +1 bonus action the first time it is played.

name: Paramedic Jacket
effect: Restore 10 HP and block 10 DMG
logic_action: Immediately restores 10 HP and blocks 10 DMG.

name: Press Vest
effect: Negate one sniper attack completely
logic_action: If an enemy attacks with a weapon tagged as sniper, scoped_pistol, hunting_rifle, or silenced_rifle, this card automatically intercepts and absorbs the damage before any other card or the player.

name: Firefighter Pants
effect: Immune to fire damage effects
logic_action: Permanently immune to fire-tagged damage cards while in play.

name: M65 Jacket
effect: Blocks 15 DMG, resistant to cold debuffs
logic_action: Blocks 15 DMG. Cold resistance is aesthetic only. Must be attacked before damage can hit player.

name: Riders Jacket
effect: Block 10 DMG and gain 5 armor
logic_action: Blocks 10 DMG. While in play, grants +5 bonus armor.

name: Leather Shoes
effect: Silent steps – avoid first trap card
logic_action: Prevents the first trap card that would trigger against the player. One-time use, then card remains as standard shield.

name: Tracksuit Jacket
effect: Increase draw speed – draw 2 on next turn
logic_action: Draw 2 cards per turn while in play, if hand space allows. Defaults to 1 draw if hand is full.

name: Military Boots
effect: Reduce terrain penalty, +1 movement effect
logic_action: Environmental and movement buffs are aesthetic only for now.

name: Field Vest
effect: Blocks 20 DMG and stores 1 extra card
logic_action: Blocks 20 DMG. Player draws 1 extra card immediately upon playing the card.

name: Chest Holster
effect: Carry 1 extra weapon card, blocks 10 DMG
logic_action: Draw 1 random attack card. If space in hand or field, place it there. If no space, return card to top of draw pile.

name: Stabproof Vest
effect: Reduces melee damage by 50%
logic_action: Blocks 10 DMG. Grants +5 armor to the next defense card placed after this one.

name: Assault Backpack
effect: Draw 1 extra card per turn while equipped
logic_action: Allows the player to draw 1 extra card per turn while in play, if hand space allows.

name: Drybag Backpack
effect: Immune to water-based card effects
logic_action: Place on field. Must be attacked and destroyed before it can be discarded. Environmental immunity is currently aesthetic only.

name: Tactical Backpack
effect: Add 1 bonus loot draw per round
logic_action: Each turn, draw 1 random loot card from your draw pile (if any exist). If none, effect fails.

name: Skate Helmet
effect: Blocks 10 DMG and avoids critical hits
logic_action: Blocks 10 DMG. Negates the first incoming critical hit attack (e.g. buffed Mosin or scoped pistol combos).

name: Boonie Hat
effect: Grants camouflage – first attack against you misses
logic_action: Grants camouflage. The first attack targeting the player automatically misses.

name: Welding Mask
effect: Immune to explosive traps
logic_action: Grants full immunity to any trap or card tagged as explosive.

name: Improvised Vest
effect: Blocks 5 DMG, craftable during play
logic_action: Blocks 5 DMG. When played, draw 1 random loot card from your deck (if available).

name: Binoculars
effect: Reveal the next 3 cards in both players' decks
logic_action: Play from hand. Reveal the next 3 cards in both players' decks. Discard this card after use.

name: Rangefinder
effect: Double the damage of your next sniper rifle card
logic_action: Play from hand. Double the damage of your next sniper, scoped_pistol, silenced_rifle, or hunting_rifle card. Cannot be played if none exist in hand or draw. Discard after use.

name: Handheld Transceiver
effect: Coordinate play – allows 1 extra action this turn
logic_action: Play from hand. Grants 1 extra action this turn only. Discard this card after use.

name: Compass
effect: Navigate through traps this turn – immune to all trap effects
logic_action: Play from hand. Immune to all trap-tagged effects this turn. Discard this card after use.

name: Map
effect: Rearrange the top 5 cards of your deck
logic_action: Play from hand. Rearrange the top 5 cards of your draw pile. Discard this card after use.

name: Headtorch
effect: Reveal all hidden trap cards in play
logic_action: Play from hand. Reveal all enemy trap cards placed face-down. Discard after use.

name: Night Vision Goggles
effect: Bypass all stealth/infected card effects for 2 turns
logic_action: Play from hand. Immune to stealth and infected-tagged effects for 2 turns. Discard after effect ends.

name: Tripwire
effect: If opponent plays a card next turn, deal 15 DMG
logic_action: Place face-down on field. If opponent plays a card next turn, deal 15 DMG and stun for 1 turn. Discard after activation.

name: Duct Tape
effect: Repair any damaged defense card
logic_action: Play from hand. Repair any damaged defense card currently in play. Restore to full durability. Discard this card after use.

name: Megaphone
effect: Force opponent to play their top card
logic_action: Play from hand. Force opponent to immediately play the top card of their deck. Discard after use.

name: Walkie Talkie
effect: Swap one card with your discard pile
logic_action: Play from hand. Swap one card in your hand with any visible card in your discard pile. Discard after use.

name: Flashlight
effect: Negate any one infected card effect
logic_action: Play from hand. Negate any one active infected-tagged card effect. Discard this card after use.

name: Glow Stick
effect: Mark enemy – next attack does double damage
logic_action: Play from hand. Mark 1 enemy card. Your next attack against it this turn deals double damage. Discard after use.

name: Hunting Scope
effect: Guarantee critical hit with next ranged weapon (+10 DMG)
logic_action: Play from hand. Guarantee a critical hit with your next ranged-tagged weapon card (+10 DMG). Does not stack. Discard after use.

name: Weapon Cleaning Kit
effect: Refresh any weapon card from discard pile
logic_action: Play from hand. Select 1 discarded gun-tagged attack card and shuffle it into your draw pile. Discard after use.

name: Can of Tactical Bacon
effect: Restore 20 HP
logic_action: Play from hand. Restore 20 HP to player. Discard after use.

name: MRE
effect: Restore 25 HP
logic_action: Play from hand. Restore 25 HP to player. Discard after use.

name: Canteen
effect: Restore 10 HP and block dehydration for 1 turn
logic_action: Play from hand. Restore 10 HP and block dehydration effect for 1 turn (aesthetic only). Discard after use.

name: Box of Nails
effect: Use to set a trap or reinforce defense (+5 armor)
logic_action: Play from hand. Choose 1: reinforce 1 defense card with +5 armor, or draw 1 random trap card from your deck. Discard after use.

name: Jerry Can
effect: Burns enemy for 10 DMG over 2 turns
logic_action: Play from hand. Deal 10 DMG to opponent over 2 turns. Tagged as fire. Discard after use.

name: Dynamite
effect: Deals 30 DMG to both players
logic_action: Play from hand. Deal 30 DMG to both players. Tagged as explosive. Discard after use.

name: First Aid Kit
effect: Fully heal 1 injured card
logic_action: Play from hand. Fully heal 1 damaged defense card on your field. If no valid target, discard with no effect.

name: Box of Ammo
effect: Buff your next gun attack by +10 DMG
logic_action: Play from hand. Buff your next gun-tagged attack card by +10 DMG. Discard after use.

name: Fishing Rod
effect: Draw 1 random card from the loot pile
logic_action: Play from hand. Draw 1 random loot card from your discard pile. Discard after use.

name: Lockpick
effect: Steal 1 loot card from enemy
logic_action: Play from hand. Steal 1 loot card at random from opponent’s hand. If no loot card exists, discard this card.

name: Battery
effect: Recharge 1 used tactical item
logic_action: Play from hand. Recharge 1 tactical card in your discard pile. Shuffle it into your draw pile. Discard after use.

name: Rope
effect: Bind enemy, skip their next turn
logic_action: Play from hand. Bind enemy, they skip their next turn. Tagged as trap. Discard after use.

name: Cooking Pot
effect: Convert one loot card into 15 HP
logic_action: Play from hand. Select 1 loot card in your hand and destroy it to heal 15 HP. If no loot card exists, discard with no effect.

name: Sewing Kit
effect: Repair damaged defense item (restore 10 durability)
logic_action: Play from hand. Repair 1 damaged defense card in play. Restore 10 durability. Must have a damaged target to activate. Discard after use.

name: Gun Cleaning Kit
effect: Restore discarded gun card to your hand
logic_action: Play from hand. Return 1 used gun-tagged attack card from your discard pile to your draw pile. Shuffle afterward. Discard after use.

name: Walker (Civilian)
effect: Infects player – skip next turn
logic_action: Play from hand. Infects player — they skip their next turn. Discard after use.

name: Runner (Military)

logic_action: Play from hand. Deal 15 DMG and force opponent to discard 1 card. Discard after use.

name: Crawler
effect: Drags player – lose next draw
logic_action: Play from hand. Drags opponent — they lose next draw phase. Discard after use.

name: Burnt Infected

logic_action: Play from hand. Applies burning status — 5 DMG over 2 turns. Tagged as fire. Discard after use.

name: Police Infected

logic_action: Play from hand. Calls for backup — randomly plays another infected card from your hand, deck, or discard pile. Discard after use.

logic_action: Play from hand. Immune to all gas and poison tagged traps. Deals 10 DMG. Discard after use.

name: Doctor Infected

logic_action: Play from hand. Siphons health — you lose 10 HP, enemy gains 5 HP. Discard after use.

name: Hunter Infected

logic_action: Play from hand. Steals 1 defense card from opponent’s hand or field. If none exist, discard with no effect.

name: Survivor Infected

logic_action: Play from hand. Deal 12 DMG and nullifies next healing effect from opponent. Discard after use.

name: Prisoner Infected

logic_action: Play from hand. Locks opponent’s hand — they cannot play any cards next round. Discard after use.

name: Spitter (Mutated)

logic_action: Play from hand. Acid spit — destroy 1 random gear or armor card. Discard after use.

logic_action: Play from hand. Explodes — deal 20 DMG to both players. Tagged as explosive. Discard after use.

logic_action: Play from hand. Charge — deal 18 DMG and immune to trap effects. Discard after use.

logic_action: Play from hand. Swing cleaver — deal 25 DMG if not blocked by defense. Discard after use.

name: Behemoth
effect: Boss – deals 30 DMG, can’t be countered
logic_action: Play from hand. Boss unit — deal 30 DMG. This card cannot be countered or avoided. Discard after use.
